# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=60.0, y=-60.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of belt-group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) and transport-belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) and transport-belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them. Burner mining drills and burners inserters are currently out of fuel.
- Ensure that burner entities are connected to a power source if necessary.

### Errors when using offshore pump
- No errors found for offshore pump.

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a boiler and a power source.

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty and have a full output.

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network.

### Errors when using belt groups
- Ensure that belt groups are not empty.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined by the agent.
